page.title: 01NORTH TAWTON
page.content: {NORTH TAWTON}is a small market town situated just to the north of{DARTMOOR 7 miles east of{Okehampton}in the county of{DEVON. {Population}- 1200approx. Bideford - 28miles, Exeter - 20miles Plymouth - 38miles {Industry}- Express Dairies Cheese Factory - one of the largest and most modern in Europe - employs 200 {Surrounding Area}- very much involved in agriculture - rural in nature. {Topography}- gently undulating. {Rivers}- River Taw runs at bottom of town. {Parish Church}- 12th. Century. {Market Days}- alternate Thursdays. {School}- North Tawton County Primary. {Inns}- Fountain Inn, Ring of Bells, White Hart, Copper Key. {Garages}- Bloggs Garage, Stan's Garage, Exeter Street Garage.
